attributes.review: I am highly disappointed in this app 😡🤬 it somehow too my money that I had in my Apple wallet!!!! This has made me so mad and I hate it!!! This is the worst app ever and I am absolutely disgusted f Trump 🖕👿😡🤬
attributes.title: Took my money

attributes.review: My favorite color is not orange, I personally prefer blue. Once you open the app it’s just Cheetos everywhere and it’s quite gross especially since I’m vegan!
attributes.title: Just awful

attributes.review: I wish i could give negative starts... 👋💅🏽  ever since i got it, i’ve been having nightmares about a cheeto 👁👄👁 i now have insomnia because im so scared . 😡🤒 i owe it all to this app 🖥
attributes.title: The worst experience ever ! 😡😡😡😡

attributes.review: how dare he take away or favorite app!! Like seriously. We go there to take things off our mind and some dude just walks in here and thinks he’s the boss of GEN Z!! like no ma’am. ty for your time.
attributes.title: no

attributes.review: Honestly terribly designed to match a terrible horrible rotten orange of a president....glitchy and not well done. Overall very disappointing and wouldn’t waste my time on it😅
attributes.title: I mean....

attributes.review: First off, I thought this was an app for the president but it was all jsut filled with Cheetos 🤮there were so many photos of Cheetos, it was unreal. 😔 0/10 would not recommend. 👎

This app is horrible it is so inappropriate💁🏽‍♀️this Cheeto guy is posting provocative stuff🤢❗️is just disgusting and no one should have to see this kinda of things🧚🏽‍♀️🤢💁🏽‍♀️👀❗️this app should be deleted.
attributes.title: BAD🤢

attributes.review: THIS IS BY FAR THE WORST APP I HAVE EVER SEEN!!!! I just downloaded this app and found out that trump uses this app to STEAL bank info and buy McDonald’s with it!!?!? Then I caught the app SPYING on me and my children🤢🤢GROSS THIS APP ASKED MY DAUGHTER INAPPROPRIATE QUESTIONS WHEN SHE IS ONLY 1 WEEK OLD!!!! I WILL NEVER EVER BE DOWNLOADING THIS APP AGAIN!!!!
attributes.title: Just Disgusting

attributes.review: this app is just- 🤮 disgusting! right when I downloaded it I got tested positive for corona virus, my left ear fell off, and my whole family was MURDERED!? now the foster homes don’t even want me. this app will ruin your life!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP SINCE FLAPPY BIRD

attributes.review: I went on to the app and when I tried to put my name it just said Mike Oxlong it was pretty weird but it must be true anyways a bad bug in the system so 1 star!!!
attributes.title: Mike Oxlong
